gobblin.kafka.schemareg

Class ConfigDrivenMd5SchemaRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.kafka.schemareg.ConfigDrivenMd5SchemaRegistry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KafkaSchemaRegistry<MD5Digest,Schema>

    public class ConfigDrivenMd5SchemaRegistry
extends Object
implements KafkaSchemaRegistry<MD5Digest,Schema>
    A SchemaRegistry that hands out MD5 based ids based on configuration Can be configured to be initialized with a single schema name, value pair. ConfigDrivenMd5SchemaRegistry.ConfigurationKeys for configuration.

      Will throw a SchemaRegistryException if it cannot find any schema for the provided name.
      boolean hasInternalCache()
      SchemaRegistry implementations that do not have an internal cache can set this to false and Gobblin will supplement such registries with a cache on top (if enabled).

      Register this schema under the provided name

        public boolean hasInternalCache()
